DOC.brief_summary: This 24 week study evaluate effect botulinum toxin Type A semen quality patient sign symptom Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Effect Botulinum Toxin Type A Semen Quality Patients With Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
